# Dysfunction

:::{.callout-note title="DPT 836"}
Lesions result in issues with movement coordination, equilibrium, and postural and proximal stability
:::


# Deficits in cerebellar function

::: {.callout}

- 1.13 DEFICITS IN CEREBELLAR FUNCTIONS ..389 @DynamicNeurologicalStabilizationClinicalRehabilitation2014

:::

- Ataxia
- Hypermetria
- Adiadochokinesia
- Asynergy
- Flaccidity
- Cerebellar tremor
- Eye movement disturbances
- Paleocerebellar and Neocerebellar syndrome
- Paleocerebellar syndrome
- Neocerebellar syndrome
- Pseudogerebellar syndrome
